channel.title: Moparstaus page servers
channel.description:
Please mod move this thread if it's in the wrong area.
~ Well I've been here for about a year or two (forgot old acc pw.) But When a server goes under %40 uptime, doesnt it get deleted? Or so I thought :o Well with the new status page I had my server registerd and up for 24 hours a day for 6 days, then shut it down for 4 days re coded and made a new server ( Diferent source and compleatly re coded) , old one was a 525, now using 317. Well I wanted to make a new server status thing since I made my 317 and I cannot seem to do it.
I've tried the following: 1) Changing the no-ip 2) Changing the source and type(317/508) 3) Changing ports 4)Making new mopar accounts and regesitring fully 5)Asked my mother.
And none of the above worked at all, except 5 , she said she would call? I lol'd.
anyways Is there a way of making my page appear again (like a reset) >.> I'm now on a dedi I payed $120 for 2 months and Compleatly re done website/ webclient/ and even added perfect duel arena on my 317 and almsot perfect D claw (not those weird looking ones) NOTE: I will not give any server detail so there is no advirtsing in anyway, that's why there's the status page. which I can't seem to get on anymore :/.
If some on could post a comment to help or if an admin or mod can help me out here, I will bake you custome made cookies, compatable with 317's.
sad thing is, I'm not joking. lol :) thanks for your time - Francisco

item.title: Moparstaus page servers
item.dc:creator: @boypipo boypipo
item.description:
@boypipo wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:2, topic:287127”]You know creating a new account is against the rules and could get you banned right?

Why don’t you just edit your old server and change the version to 317? Whats the problem?[/quote]

Oh, I’m sorry ,I forgot it was against the rules, and I shut down my server for 2 weeks due to irl issues and changing the type from 525 - 317, but even if I edit it, Its never again going to show at 100%uptime because It’s 24/7 now =/.
*Hoping to get my server on status page deleted * so I can re create it
I back good cookies?

Read full topic

item.description:

Hmm I want whatever hes taking :|[/quote]

item.description:
@boypipo wrote:

Please mod move this thread if it’s in the wrong area.

~
Well I’ve been here for about a year or two (forgot old acc pw.) But When a server goes under %40 uptime, doesnt it get deleted? Or so I thought :o Well with the new status page I had my server registerd and up for 24 hours a day for 6 days, then shut it down for 4 days re coded and made a new server ( Diferent source and compleatly re coded) , old one was a 525, now using 317. I’ve tried the following:

  1. Changing the no-ip
  2. Changing the source and type(317/508)
  3. Changing ports

    5)Asked my mother.

And none of the above worked at all, except 5 , she said she would call? I lol’d.

anyways Is there a way of making my page appear again (like a reset) >.> I’m now on a dedi I payed $120 for 2 months and Compleatly re done website/ webclient/ and even added perfect duel arena on my 317 and almsot perfect D claw (not those weird looking ones)
NOTE: I will not give any server detail so there is no advirtsing in anyway, that’s why there’s the status page. which I can’t seem to get on anymore :/.

If some on could post a comment to help or if an admin or mod can help me out here, I will bake you custome made cookies, compatable with 317’s.
